    Classes in petadoption.model with type parameters of type Pet
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Shelter<T extends Pet>
    Shelter is a generic class that manages a list of pets.
    Subclasses of Pet in petadoption.model
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Cat
    Cat is a subclass of Pet representing a cat in the shelter.
    class 
    Dog
    Dog is a subclass of Pet representing a dog in the shelter.
    class 
    ExoticAdapter
    ExoticAdapter adapts an ExoticAnimal object to the Pet interface so that exotic animals can be treated like standard pets within the system.
    class 
    ExoticAnimal
    ExoticAnimal is a subclass of Pet that represents animals not typically categorized as standard pets.
    class 
    Rabbit
    Rabbit is a subclass of Pet representing rabbit-type animals in the shelter.
